About Me

Hello! Thanks for dropping by...

Let me tell you few things,

Based in Nigeria, am a seasoned Front-End web developer, passionate about building excellent software that improves the lives of those around me. I have a Bachelor of Engineering (BEng) degree in Electrical Electronics, but have real passion for programming and web development, where I specilize in creating unique, market-centric, informative websites that put my clients above their competition, ranging from individuals and small businesses all the way to large enterprice corporations.

I approach every project with an attention to detail and determination to exceed my clients expectations. My process is very collaborative. I like to involve my clients closely in every stage of the project, listening and fully understanding their requirements so as to deliver an online solution that meets their business goals.

When am not programming, tweeting, you'll find me in my home studio cooking up some youtube tech videos, where I share my thoughts about mobile technologies, often I work out in the gym too . Click to download my resume , for more information.

Web Designer

Front End Developer

I can build front end for my clients with nice visual using technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Bootstrap etc. Feel free to check out some of my work in my portfolio section.

Web Developer

Back End Developer

I've always been drawn to the overlap between design and development. In addition to Front-End development, I am also a Back-End developer. Technologies I use for backend are Node.JS, API, NoSQL and SQL.

Mentor

Mentoring Developers

I know how it feels like starting on the journey of Web development and software engineering, I've been there, thats why I genuinely care about newbies and fellow developers, helping them improve on their skill.
